name: Kellic Cinberbow
description1: Flaming Arrow: Deal a 75, 3 turn DoT [0 pips]
description2: Irksome Mander: Deal a 200, 4 turn DoT and clear enemy shield for 75 damage [1 pip]
description3: Dive-Bomber Beetle: Deal 125 damage and detonate a DoT [2 pips]
description4: Slithering Cinders: Deal a 300, 3 turn DoT [2 pips]
description5: Fiery Spirit: Take 75, 3 turn DoT on self and gift 3 pips [3 pips]
description6: Surtr's Rage: Deal 300, 3 turn DoT to all enemies and clear enemy shield for 125 damage [5 pips]
description7: Flames Of Fury: Deal 125 damage and gain a pip if you have a HoT [1 pip]
description8: Volatile Blaze: Deal a 450, 3 turn Dot and detonate if enemy has a mantle [3 pips]
description9: Hearth Elf: Deal 75 damage and a 75, 3 turn DoT if you have a shield [0 pips]
description10: Blaze Of Glory: Take 250 damage and gift 3 pips to whole team [4 pips]

name: Arbenbrand Frostarrow
description1: Flash Freeze: Deal 50 damage and clear blade for 1 pip to self [0 pips]
description2: Shivering Swarm: Place a 125 trap and clear blade for 50 damage [1 pip]
description3: Fateful Ward: Place a 75 shield and gift 1 pip [1 pip]
description5: Ominous Ward: Place a 100 shield and gift 3 pips [4 pips]
description6: Debilitate: Place a 250 trap on all enemies and clear blade for 100 damage [5 pips]
description7: Shatterstrike: Deal 75 damage and stun enemy if you have a shield / trap [1 pip]
description8: Resolution: Place a 300 shield and clear mantle for 1 pip [3 pips]
description9: Snowball Storm: Deal 50 damage and place a 50 weakness if enemy has a mantle [0 pips]
description10: Bracing Cold: Gift whole team 3 pips and a 150 shield if they have a shield / trap [6 pips]

name: Alagorn Lightningdart
description1: Galvanize: Place a 75 blade and remove a mantle [0 pips]
description3: Power Surge: Place a 125 blade and clear DoT for a 75 blade to self [1 pip]
description4: Bluster Blast: Deal 250 damage and clear DoT on self for 1 pip [2 pips]
description5: Overcharge: Gift 3 pips and a 125 blade if you have a HoT [3 pips]
description6: Energy Pulse: Deal 250 damage to all enemies and clear DoT on whole team for 1 pip [5 pips]
description7: Static Discharge: Deal 75 damage and place a 50 trap if enemy has a HoT / DoT [0 pips]
description8: Nerve Shock: Deal 125 damage and stun enemy [2 pips]
description9: Precipitous: Place a 125 blade and remove a mantle for whole team [3 pips]
description10: Energy Wave: Deal 250 damage to all enemies and place a 100 trap if enemy has a HoT / DoT [4 pips]

name: Aren Treebow
description1: Elvish Enchantment: Beguile enemy minion for 2 turns [0 pips]
description2: Big Bad Butterfly: Deal 100 damage and push DoT to enemy [1 pip]
description3: Poisoned Pig: Deal a 200, 4 turn DoT and 50 damage if enemy team has a minion [1 pip]
description4: Healing Hand: Heal 200 HP and a 100, 4 turn HoT if you have a blade [2 pips]
description5: Reinvigorate: Place a 300, 3 turn HoT and a 100 blade [3 pips]
description6: Forest Fury: Deal a 225, 3 turn DoT to all enemies and 100 damage if enemy team has a minion [5 pips]
description7: Lifeforce Overflow: Deal 50 damage and detonate DoT if enemy has a mantle [0 pips]
description8: Vitality Surge: Place a double pip, 4 turn bubble and extend HoT by 2 turns [3 pips]
description9: Happy Healers: Place a 300, 3 turn HoT and heal 100 HP if enemy team has a minion [2 pips]
description10: Spinning Squirrel: Deal 200 damage to all enemies and gain a pip if enemy has a DoT [4 pips]

name: Galladran Skullshot
description1: Healsteal Blade: Remove enemy HoT and place a 50 blade on self [0 pips]
description2: Death's Embrace: Place a 100 weakness and clear enemy HoT for a 75 weakness [1 pip]
description3: Parry Blade: Place a 100 blade or 150 blade if you have a shield [1 pip]
description4: Carrion Scream: Deal 125 damage and gain a 50 blade if enemy has a HoT [1 pip]
description5: Feline Fatale: Deal 250 damage and steal enemy blade [2 pips]
description6: Eldritch Hex: Steal 200 HP from all enemies and clear enemy blade for 100 weakness [5 pips]
description7: Deadly Weapons: Place a 200 blade for whole team and a 150 shield if they have a shield [4 pips]
description8: Deathly Toll: Deal 125 damage and stun self [0 pips]
description9: Touch Of Unlife: Steal 150 HP and clear enemy blade for 100 weakness [2 pips]
description10: Death Breath: Deal 150 damage to all enemies and give a 100 blade to self if you have a shield [3 pips]

name: Titanio Sandslinger
description1: Slow Erode: Deal a 75, 3 turn DoT and place a 75 weakness [0 pips]
description2: Pip Pluck: Steal 1 enemy pip [1 pip]
description3: DoT For A DoT: Deal 125 damage and place a 75, 3 turn DoT if you have a DoT [1 pip]
description4: Efreets Of Strength: Deal 250 damage and detonate DoT if enemy has a mantle [2 pips]
description5: Ray Of Blight: Deal a 250, 5 turn DoT and a 50 weakness to all enemies [4 pips]
description6: It Devours: Deal 250 damage to all enemies and remove a pip from all enemies [5 pips]
description7: Terrible Tiger: Deal 125 damage and remove a pip from enemy [2 pips]
description8: Wind-Up: Place a 125 damage, 2 turn bubble and gift 2 pips [3 pips]
description9: Wear Of Time: Deal 125 damage and add a turn to enemy DoT [1 pip]
description10: Wounding Slash: Deal a 500, 5 turn DoT [3 pips]
